header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Strength of accents, sound of speech, marital problems, parental rights/responsibilities, custody disputes, alcoholism, childhood memories, living environment, obesity, health, riding bicycles, voice recognition/ mobile devices, distances, Minecraft, TV shows, mattresses.
header.activity: Family sharing problems, opinions and memories
header.conv_type: Discussing, explaining, complaining, advising, requesting, anecdote telling
